short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert html tag for registered urls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you access the configured page, the HTML of the specified label will be displayed.

For example, you can give a label to stg.example.com or dev.example.com.
I would expect someone developing in a different environment to use it.

It eliminates the mistake of accidentally touching the production environment.
